configuration.getIndex: select t.zc_index from zc_copy_test01 t where t.zc_id = '移动网' and t.zhanzhi_name = ? group by t.zc_index
configuration.getSqlZCOne: select t.ANLN1 from zc_copy_test01 t where t.zc_index = ? and t.zhanzhi_name = ? and t.zc_id = '移动网' order by t.aktiv desc
configuration.getSqlZYOne: select t.id from zy_copy_test01 t where t.zy_index = ? and t.zhanzhi_name =? and t.zy_id = '移动网'
configuration.insertSqlPP: update zy_copy_test01 t set t.zy_pp = ? where t.id = ? and t.is_match=1
configuration.getLocation: select t.zhanzhi_name,t.zhanzhi_suoyin,t.city ,rownum rn from ZCZYPP_JZMC t
configuration.zhanzhi_pp: update zc_copy_test01 t set t.zhanzhi_name = ?,t.zc_id='移动网' where ( (t.ltext like ? and t.anlhtxt like ?) or (t.ltext = '省公司本部' and t.anlhtxt like ? and t.anlhtxt like ? )) and t.zz_key like '07%' and t.aktiv < '20160101'
configuration.zhanzhi_pp_2: update zc_copy_test01 t set t.zhanzhi_name = ? where (t.ltext like '%海口%' or t.ltext like '%省公司本部%') and t.anlhtxt like ? and t.zz_key like '07%' and t.aktiv < '20160101'
configuration.zhanzhi_pp_zy: update zy_copy_test01 t set t.zhanzhi_name = ? ,t.zy_id='移动网' where t.jiz_name like ? and t.is_match =1
configuration.statistic_exist1: update YD_statistic t set t.zy_zhanzhi_exist =1 where t.zhanzhi in ( (select distinct(a.zhanzhi) from YD_STATISTIC a where a.zy_num=0 and a.zc_id='移动网') minus (select distinct(b.zhanzhi_name) from zy_copy_test01 b where b.zy_id='移动网') )
configuration.statistic_exist0: update YD_statistic t set t.zy_zhanzhi_exist=0 where t.zy_zhanzhi_exist is null and t.zy_num=0
